review: ĞÑ‡ĞµĞ½ÑŒ ĞºĞ°Ñ‡ĞµÑÑ‚Ğ²ĞµĞ½Ğ½Ñ‹Ğ¹ Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ´Ğ±Ğ¾Ñ€ Ğ¸Ğ³Ñ€Ğ¾ĞºĞ¾Ğ² Ğ¸ Ğ¸Ğ´ĞµĞ°Ğ»ÑŒĞ½Ñ‹Ğ¹  Ğ±Ğ°Ğ»Ğ°Ğ½Ñ Ğ³ĞµÑ€Ğ¾ĞµĞ²

â™›  ğ™‚ğ™§ğ™šğ™–ğ™© ğ™œğ™–ğ™¢ğ™š ğ™§ğ™ªğ™ğ™£ğ™šğ™™ ğ™—ğ™® bobby kotick  â™›











To anyone saying this is a troll review heres my full review:

Servers are still actively being ddos'd and the game can be sometimes unplayable.
Servers have been downgraded in general since OW1 has been ended:
Your ping might seem lower than it was in ow1 but it doesnt matter, your Interpolation Delay (IND) is always fluctuating between 22-27 and sometimes goes up to 29 which basically makes noregs happen every second and desyncs what you see clientside vs what actually happens serverside. (moxy loves this)
basically, worse hitreg.
ITS BEEN A YEAR BLIZZARD, PLEASE FIX THX.

FPS overall is worse, dropping from 300-400 on low settings 1080p in ow1 to 180-300 in ow2 on my budget setup (ryzen 5 3600 gtx 1060 2x8gb 3200mhz) meaning 240hz is no longer an option even tho this is suppose to be an esport title (but i will be honest it has better optimizations than tf2)

TheCommunityTM is still terrible and will continue being like that since blizzard (bobby kotick) has fired most of the employees that moderate and review chat reports to cut down on the budget and fill his pocket furthermore :)
Basically people spamming the n words with hard r's is kind of common and 90% of the time they dont even get banned lol

smurfs are as common as ever making each rank feel meaningless + many boosted diamond player can be grandmaster or even top500 (and many of them mfs exist)
(cheaters are fairly common aswell nowdays)

top500 rewards are non existent
back in ow1 you used to at least get animated season sprays as a reward for finishing as a top 500 ladder player but those rewards have been gone ever since ow2's release 
haha pve (real talk i dont care about pve that much)

game got no updates for 3 years because of the "RPG pve" that was planned for ow2 that eventually got scrapped, oh well.

anyways heh what a game, used to be a great game by a great company, now its a shell of its former self, and the company is long gone, corrupted by greed (bobby kotick)

Good game with a bad monetizing model. Just to clarify, F2P is always bad as it have to rely on microtransactions. I am still voting it positive, and I'm against haters, and unreasonable review bombers. The game itself is great and that what it matters. I still hope the model will be adjusted, i.e. committed players to be able to earn battle passes.

The Game requires you to have a Battle net account, but [u] you dont have to install the Battle net launcher for the game to launch[/u] (The game launches independently on STEAM)

[h1] I Recommend the game [/h1] As long as you stick with game's [b] " Free to Play " [/b]

[b] Micro-transactions and in-game purchases are optional[/b], but the price tags on these in-game cosmetics and DLC are horrendous. And I refuse to spend a single dime in this game after they butchered the original Cooperative PvE game mode 

[spoiler] If Starcraft miraculously comes to STEAM, I'm buying that and nothing else [/spoiler]

Remember when Overwatch 1 was GOTY?
They stopped trying short after.

I have 4 locked heros.
I thought that Heros over time will be added to the global pool, apparently not.
So I guess over time, my entire library will get filled with locked icons.
The main focus of this game was PvE. That is now locked behind a paywall.

When I was on Overwatch 1, I was playing a game.
When I'm on this, I'm playing a microtransaction simulator.

Came from overwatch 1, loved the game. PAID for the game, only for them to take my money and release the same game free to play. you stole from me and only delivered empty promises. you deserve every negative review here, i recommend fellow overwatch 1 players download it and sit on the main menu for 5 mins to tell how you feel about this.
